description.p: Document Suggestion Widget based on Select2 JS library. Nuxeo Automation is used to manage Select2 data binding.

helpLabels.label: Width in pixels of the Select2 ComboBox
Minimal number of characters before calling the server to fetch the suggestions
NXQL Query to fetch the suggestions
Document Schemas that should be fetched and sent to the JS client side.

Name of the JavaScript function name that will be called by select2 to do the formating of the suggestion entries. The target function should take as input the javascript Document as returned by Automation and should return some Html.
Name of the Document property that should be used to define the ID of entry. If unset Document.uid will be used, otherwise Document.properties['idProperty'].
Name of the Document property that should be used to define the Label of entry. If unset Document.title will be used, otherwise Document.properties['labelProperty'].
Javascript to be injected in the page with the Widget.
Id of the Nuxeo repositry that should be accessed. If unsed, the default repository will be used.
ID of the Automation Operation that will be used to fetch the suggestions. If unsed, Document.PageProvider will be used.
ID of the Automation Operation that will be used to fetch the initial Document from the stored value.. If unsed, simple uid resolution will be used.
Boolean to hide the instruction label.
The Instruction label is displayed below the widget.
The placeholder displayed in the select when no option is chosen yet.

description.p: Uses Select2 JS library to render a selection / suggestion widget where suggestions are loaded from a given directory.

helpLabels.label: Width in pixels of the select2 combobox

Name of the JavaScript function name that will be called by select2 to do the formating of the suggestion entries. The target function should take as input the javascript Document as returned by Automation and should return some Html.
Minimal number of characters before calling the server to fetch the suggestions
Name of the directory

Name of the Directory field that should be used to define the Label of entry. If unset 'label' will be used. In case of localization with a directory field for each supported language (see dbl10n option), by default fields named like 'label_en', 'label_fr' or 'label_de' will be searched. You can customize looked up fields by specifing a pattern like 'label_{lang}' where the part {lang} will be replaced with the current locale.
Javascript to be injected in the page with the Widget.
Boolean to hide the instruction label.
The Instruction label is displayed below the widget.

Check this option means that the labels are localized with translations provided in the directory itself (i.e. in fields). Otherwise labels are translated as usual picking values in messages*.properties files.
The placeholder displayed in the select when no option is chosen yet.
Check this option to allow selection of intermediate groups.
Check this option to apply filter on intermediate groups.
Check this option if you want obsolete entries to be selectable.
